OpenCms ships with a feature-rich standard template called Mercury. It presents most of the OpenCms features in action. There is a publicly available Mercury demo server providing a personal OpenCms installation exclusively for you. All you need to do is register with a valid email address.

  • https://demo.opencms.org

We will not use the data you provide for anything else than setting up your personal demo installation!
